channel.title: Your Mainstream 90s RPG Character Alter Egos?
channel.description:
I ask these two solemn question of you all, though it be uncouth within the mysterious hallowed halls of indie games...
1) You're rolling a Dungeons & Dragons character that is literally you. You get to assign stats: 15,14,13,12,10, 8. What are your stats?
Mine: STR: 8 DEX: 13 CON: 10 INT: 14 WIS: 12 CHAR: 15
2) While we're at it, what was your clan when you played Vampire: The Masquerade in the 90s??? Late Gen Xers and early Millennials in indie games, you know I see you!
I was obviously Malkavian.

item.title: Your Mainstream 90s RPG Character Alter Egos?
item.dc:creator: @SabineV5
item.description:
@SabineV5 wrote:

1. You’re rolling a Dungeons & Dragons character that is literally you. You get to assign stats: 15,14,13,12,10, 8. What are your stats?

STR: 8
DEX: 10
CON: 13
INT: 15
WIS: 12
CHAR: 14

2. While we’re at it, what was your clan when you played Vampire: The Masquerade in the 90s??? Late Gen Xers and early Millennials in indie games, you know I see you!

Toreador. I’ve played others, but I always wanted to be an artist!

Read full topic

item.title: Your Mainstream 90s RPG Character Alter Egos?
item.dc:creator: @Ferret
item.description:
@Ferret wrote:

Str 10
Dex 12
Con 8
Int 15
Wis 13
Cha 14

My vampire clan was not a clan at all, but the Nagaraja bloodline! I play a mean Flesheater.

item.title: Your Mainstream 90s RPG Character Alter Egos?
item.dc:creator: @JimLikesGames
item.description:
@JimLikesGames wrote:

oh_theogony:

You’re rolling a Dungeons & Dragons character that is literally you. You get to assign stats: 15,14,13,12,10, 8. What are your stats?

STR 13 DEX 8 CON 15 INT 14 WIS 12 CHA 10

My Vampire clan was A Champions Campaign That Lasted Like 10 Years because I wasn’t nearly cool enough to play Vampire.

Read full topic

item.title: Your Mainstream 90s RPG Character Alter Egos?
item.dc:creator: @Humza_K
item.description:
@Humza_K wrote:

oh_theogony:

You’re rolling a Dungeons & Dragons character that is literally you. You get to assign stats: 15,14,13,12,10, 8. What are your stats?

Ugh, arrays. But if assigning: Str 10 Dex 12 Con 8 Int 15 Wis 14 Cha 13

'90s/2000s me played a Ventrue who fed on criminals but did not kill them.

(Yes, I accidentally made Batman.)

Read full topic

item.title: Your Mainstream 90s RPG Character Alter Egos?
item.dc:creator: @czakita
item.description:
@czakita wrote:

I did. And the dialogue options are almost good enough to forgive the lack of the Ravnos
Also, the urge of running a Masquerade game in the spirit of the late nineties/early two-thousands is STRONG.

Read full topic

item.title: Your Mainstream 90s RPG Character Alter Egos?
item.dc:creator: @TKuech
item.description:
@TKuech wrote:

I should ask my middle school students this…

For me:

STR: 8
DEX: 10
CON: 13
INT: 12
WIS: 14
CHAR: 15

But speaking of my middle school students…
What I thought my stats were in middle school:

STR: 8
DEX: 12
CON: 14
INT: 10
WIS: 15
CHA: 13

Read full topic
item.source: Your Mainstream 90s RPG Character Alter Egos?

item.title: Your Mainstream 90s RPG Character Alter Egos?
item.dc:creator: @czakita
item.description:
@czakita wrote:

Fun fact I’ve only played D&D once, as a teenager, on a convention fifteen years ago, I had my character sheet filled for me by the GM, so I don’t know what I’m doing, but I guess
STR: 10
DEX: 13
CON: 8
INT: 14
WIS: 15
CHAR: 12

But all in all I’m here to say Ravnos for life. I legit decided that I don’t want to play Bloodlines if there’s no Ravnos in this game (and as it is I am playing it for the first time now, in the year of our Lord 2019).

Read full topic
item.source: Your Mainstream 90s RPG Character Alter Egos?

item.title: Your Mainstream 90s RPG Character Alter Egos?
item.dc:creator: @Haladir
item.description:
@Haladir wrote:

Hmmm…

STR: 10
DEX: 8
CON: 13
INT: 12
WIS: 15
CHA: 14

Those mental stats are probably too high for me, honestly.

I never once played VtM, but I did play Mage: The Ascension a handful of times.
Mystic Tradition: Order of Hermes

item.title: Your Mainstream 90s RPG Character Alter Egos?
item.dc:creator: @BlakeRyan
item.description:
@BlakeRyan wrote:

hmm… Str 8. Dex 15. Con 10. Int 12. Wis 14, Cha 13. - Probably Druid. Not buff enough for Ranger.

Vampire Clan - going to say Nosferatu. I can keep very still and watch something for ages and i’ve never been popular, seems Nosferatu.

Read full topic
item.source: Your Mainstream 90s RPG Character Alter Egos?

item.title: Your Mainstream 90s RPG Character Alter Egos?
item.dc:creator: @inarvan
item.description:
@inarvan wrote:

Str 10
Dex 8
Con 12
Int 15
Wis 13
Cha 14

Those stat numbers were way too generous for me, but I rated them at least as far as that series allows. My highest stat would be 13 at best.

I never played Vampire, as it wasn’t my deal, but I was into Changeling: The Dreaming. Played trolls, redcaps, sluagh, and knockers.

Read full topic
